is_a: instance of a type or category
affects: High likelihood may result in or make changes to (term results in changes to _____)
can_affect: Some likelihood may result in or make changes to (term results in changes to _____)
quality_of: an attribute of a category or instance
related_to: general relationships that don't fit well in other categories
